title: 3 and Out - Watson Suspension, Lance Learning Curve, Deebo Deal, Hurry Up Headlines, Mailbag
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Watson Suspension, Lance Learning Curve, Deebo Deal, Hurry Up Headlines, Mailbag
description:
John gives his report on what he saw at Niners camp, why Trey Lance struggling should be expected, why Roger Goodell pushing for a longer Deshaun Watson is a PR no brainer, if the league should revisit the Calvin Ridley gambling suspension. He also quickly touches on some other top headlines, including why Lamar Jackson needs to holdout immediately, if Deebo Samuel can dominate like a Top 5 receiver, and why Forbes’ franchise valuations are laughable. He also answers listener questions in the Middlekauff Mailbag. #herd

Subscribe NOW and follow Middlekauff and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content. It's always  FanDuel for the best wagering action!
